item.title: Convert Epoch to Timestamps in Apache Flink with ``TO_TIMESTAMP_LTZ``
item.description: Sometimes when defining an Apache FlinkÂ® table using SQL we need to map an epoch timestamp and use it as record/message timestamp, this blog contains few tricks to get it right.
